meanings.definition: A rare arsenate mineral with the chemical formula [Cu₆(AsO₄)₂(OH)₆·4H₂O].
meanings.english_definition: A rare arsenate mineral with the chemical formula [Cu₆(AsO₄)₂(OH)₆·4H₂O].

examples.sentence: Weinbergerite is found in association with other copper arsenate minerals.
examples.translation: ワインバーガー石は、他の砒酸銅鉱物と共に見つかります。

etymology.value: Named after Dr. Peter Weinberger, an Austrian mineralogist.
